name: multi_agent_report
description: Full analysis of up to 10 agents in one report. Health check + risk flags + scoring for each agent, plus portfolio summary with rankings, red flags, and recommendations. Triggers: multi agent report, bulk check, portfolio audit, check multiple agents, batch analysis. Pass agent_ids array. 100 USDC.

agent_ids.description: Comma-separated list of agent IDs (up to 10). Example: '3212,4029,2651,1589'
